webscript.shortname: Thumbnail to Rendition Service optional patch.
webscript.description: This webscript applies a patch which brings pre-3.3 thumbnail content up to date with the RenditionService in Alfresco 3.3. It searches for all nodes of type cm:thumbnail and applies the appropriate rendition aspect (rn:hiddenRendition or rn:visibleRendition) if not already there. If this patch is not applied, thumbnails should continue to work as before but searches for nodes which are subclasses of rn:rendition will not return thumbnails created against a 3.2 server.
